class.name: StatisticalSummaryValues

javadoc.text: Value object representing the results of a univariate statistical summary.
The number of observations in the sample
The sum of the sample values

javadoc.param: n the number of observations in the sample
sum the sum of the values

javadoc.text: Returns true iff object is a * StatisticalSummaryValues instance and all statistics have * the same values as this.
javadoc.param: object the object to test equality against.

javadoc.text: Returns hash code based on values of statistics
Generates a text report displaying values of statistics. * Each statistic is displayed on a separate line.
javadoc.return: String with line feeds displaying statistics
